title: Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi
summary: Edoardo Alessandro Mapelli Mozzi (born 19 November 1983), also known as Edo, is a member of the British royal family, an English property developer and member of an Italian noble family. He is the founder and chief executive of Banda Property, a property development and interior design company. In 2020 he married Princess Beatrice, a niece of King Charles III. He has a daughter with Beatrice and a son from a previous relationship with Dara Huang.
